bind.calculate: if( selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_breastfeeding , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_breath , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_active , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_yellow , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_cold_hot , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_danger_signs/danger_signs_other , 'yes') ,"yes", "no" )

bind.relevant: selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_smile , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_head_hold , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_turn_to_sound , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_grasp , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_sit , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_stand , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_walk , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_talk , 'no')

selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_smile , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_head_hold , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_turn_to_sound , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_grasp , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_sit , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_stand , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_walk , 'no') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_talk , 'no')

selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_vaccines/attend_clinic , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/any_danger , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/g_developmental_milestones/developmental_refer , 'yes') or selected( /immunization_and_growth/missed_vaccine_apt , 'yes')
